feedback.metin: With a B licence, you may tow all trailers with a maximum authorised mass up to 750 kg. Heavier trailers are only allowed when the combined maximum authorised mass of the car and trailer is no more than 3500 kg. So if your car has a maximum authorised mass of 2500 kg, you can tow trailers with a maximum authorised mass up to 1000 kg. For even heavier trailers, you need a BE licence.
